pullRequest.title: Remove logs from issue body on developer menu
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available: N/A
Description of changes: On the developer menu, removes the option to include logs in the issue body generated on the "File Issue" screen. Logs will not be included in the issue body whether the "Copy to Clipboard" or "File Issue" button is pressed.
Updated file issue screen on the developer menu:

Updated GitHub issue body:

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

commit.message: remove code to include logs in GitHub issue

nodes.bodyText: Rather than remove this good work you already did, I would just modify the code which calls the function to always send false for now with a ToDo comment that for now logs aren't being included but if that changes later they can be sent.

commit.message: add back code to optionally includeLogs in createIssueBody method
